resources.string: Welcome to our app! Here you can view the most recent projects from each member of our dedicated developer team. \n\nUse the navigation options to read all about us!

Chelsea sees herself as a real life \'Coming to America\' story. Being born in Zimbabwe has given her a unique perspective of what we consider the pursuit of life, liberty, and property. Through Pursuit, she hope to become a successful developer and entrepreneur. Her goal is to pay it forward through a foundation focused on helping underprivileged people, like herself, learn the technical and soft skills for code. She is a huge Drake, SZA, and H.E.R. fan. \nShe is currently a desktop technician and lives in Long Island, New York.

I\'m a Haitian-American and lifelong student. Born and raised in Brooklyn, NY, I am currently pursing a career in tech by learning Android Development at the selective coding program called Pursuit. I love the start-up life and have worked for Taboola and quip, among other start-ups. I\'m looking forward towards a bright future and lead my life with optimism.
